basics.name: Mason Nero
basics.label: Full Ruby Web Developer
basics.summary: I am a full stacking web developer who can build apps from the ground up. I have worked at Intuit since graduation for the past 11 years. Being from intuit, customer empathy and product focus are ingrained into my approach to building software. I generally very flexible when investigating new roles.
